item.title: cryptoZombies [solidity]
item.description: CryptoZombies’s Website Note: I already have a little bit of programming experience so I will be relating some of the concepts to Javascript/C++ concepts. A great resource for learning Javascript is freeCodeCamp’s Javascript Algorithms and Data Structures Certification course Lesson 1 Solidity’s code is encapsulated in contracts. contract: fundamental building block of Ethereum applications - all variables and functions belong to a contract. Starting point of all your projects
